```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(webshot2)
library(tinytex)
library(webshot)
data = read.csv("/Users/orszagl2/Documents/siteRecruitAggMetrics/data-cleaning/joined_data3.csv")
source('by_insurance_scatter.R')
source('by_ruca_scatter.R')
source('by_race_scatter.R')
source('by_ses_scatter.R')
source('sex_plots.R')
source('ins_plots.R')
source('race_plots.R')
source('ruca_plots.R')
source('ses_plots.R')
source('color_palette.R')
source('save_plot.R')
```


Refactor Site Names
```{r}
data$site <- gsub("^Marshfield.*", "Marshfield", data$site)
unique(data$site)
```

Write list of sites to be used
```{r}
items_list = c("KP-Hawaii", "KP-Colorado", "KP-Northwest", "KP-Georgia", "Marshfield", "Sanford Health", "Henry Ford", "University of Chicago")
```




Call by_sex_scatter function for all sites
```{r, echo = FALSE}
by_sex_scatter(data, "total_verified", "KP-Hawaii")
by_sex_scatter(data, "response_ratio", "KP-Hawaii")
by_sex_scatter(data, "total_verified", "Henry Ford")
by_sex_scatter(data, "response_ratio", "Henry Ford")
by_sex_scatter(data, "total_verified", "KP-Georgia")
by_sex_scatter(data, "response_ratio", "KP-Georgia")
by_sex_scatter(data, "total_verified", "KP-Colorado")
by_sex_scatter(data, "response_ratio", "KP-Colorado")
by_sex_scatter(data, "total_verified", "KP-Northwest")
by_sex_scatter(data, "response_ratio", "KP-Northwest")
by_sex_scatter(data, "total_verified", "Sanford")
by_sex_scatter(data, "response_ratio", "Sanford")
by_sex_scatter(data, "total_verified", "University of Chicago")
by_sex_scatter(data, "response_ratio", "University of Chicago")
by_sex_scatter(data, "total_verified", "Marshfield")
by_sex_scatter(data, "response_ratio", "Marshfield")
```
